name: Castaway Trials
description:
Castaway Trials is a a Third Person Puzzle Game in which the player has to use psionic abilities to traverse the levels.

Credits:

Main Menu Music - Journey by The Indie Devs Nation.
Music and SFX (Except Main Menu Music) - Bruno Roth.

3D Assets - SYNTY Studio.

2D UI - GUI PRO KIT Fantasy RPG - LAYER LAB.

Invector-3rdPersonController_LITE -  INVECTOR TEAM.
